title: Driving anti-money laundering efficiency gains using artificial intelligence
description: Anti-money laundering (AML) is expensive and labour-intensive, and artificial intelligence (AI) can offer improved efficiency gains. Could they be a match made in heaven? This Risk.net webinar, in association with NICE Actimize, took place amid the strain on banks’ back offices driven by the lockdown in response to the global Covid‑19 pandemic, and explores this potential pairing
